title: Improve Evaluation Performance
body:
* [ ] Eric Arndt's Eval Perf PRs
  * I've asked Eric to help us with splitting #11273 to smaller pieces.
    * [x] #11780 
    * [x] #11779
    * We landed most of Erics PRs, two remain.
    * [ ] #11852 - looks good, for some reason two tests failed. But some of our tests are flaky - re running.
    * [ ] #11802 - killed pipelines in a weird way, hanging since. @Erarndt 
  * #11271 - Approved. Waiting for VS insertion to finish. There were some issues with tests, possibly unrelated. Re-running the pipeline.
* [ ] Eric Arndt spike multi-threaded eval
  * discussion in progress. Will update as we go along and eventually create a separate ticket. 
  * We're moving ahead with this one. There will be a new ticket soon-ish I think.
